name: mysql
description: This Dockerfile facilitates the setup of a MySQL container with port 3306 exposed. It utilizes the official MySQL base image and offers flexibility through customizable environment variables for configuration.

scripts.build-image: docker build -t my-mysql-image . || podman build -t my-mysql-image .
scripts.run-container: docker run -p 3306:3306 --name my-mysql-container -d my-mysql-image || podman run -p 3306:3306 --name my-mysql-container -d my-mysql-image
scripts.restart-container: docker restart my-mysql-container || podman restart my-mysql-container
scripts.stop-container: docker stop my-mysql-container || podman stop my-mysql-container
scripts.inspect-container: docker inspect my-mysql-container || podman inspect my-mysql-container
